name: Flake8 (via pipx)
description: Flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins.

version.description: Select the version of Flake8 to install.

flake8Black.description: Select the version of flake8-black to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Isort.description: Select the version of flake8-isort to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Print.description: Select the version of flake8-print to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Bandit.description: Select the version of flake8-bandit to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Pylint.description: Select the version of flake8-pylint to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Builtins.description: Select the version of flake8-builtins to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Spellcheck.description: Select the version of flake8-spellcheck to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8PytestStyle.description: Select the version of flake8-pytest-style to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Django.description: Select the version of flake8-django to install. 'none' will skip installation.

flake8Fastapi.description: Select the version of flake8-fastapi to install. 'none' will skip installation.
